sentence: Hamas  says  Haniyeh,  62,  was  killed  in  an  Israeli  strike  early  on  Wednesday  morning  in  Iran.

Earlier  this  month  Israel  said  it  had  targeted  Deif  in  deadly  air  strikes  on  Gaza  but  there  has  been  no  confirmation  he  was  killed.

He  is  the  group's  head  in  the  Gaza  Strip  and  is  believed  to  be  the  mastermind  behind  the  7  October  attacks  in  Israel  that  killed  1,200  people  and  sparked  the  ongoing  conflict.
